definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: Eḳrôn, Akkarwn (in As. Amḳarruna COT:Gloss., Dl:Pa 289 who prop. [[עַקָּרוֹן]] );—Philistine city, one of the famous five, Am 1:8, Jos 13:3 (D) + 4 t. Jos (P), Ju Jdg 1:18, 1Sa 5:10, 1Sa 5:10 + 5 t. 1 S; 2Ki 1:2, 2Ki 1:3, 2Ki 1:6, 2Ki 1:16, Je 25:20, Zep 2:4, Zec 9:5, Zec 9:7; mod. ‘Âkir Rob:BR i. 227 ff. GASm:Geogr.198 Buhl:Geogr.187 f.
